data.message: Hey Em...I know you will never answer me and you will never see this,but anyway...I want to thank you for music you make,for bringing happiness to my life...When I was in trouble or had problems in my life,I remember you and everything is getting better.No one can imagine how much I adore you.Some people just laugh at me saying "you have your own life,go study all day all night thinking about nothing else" They will never understand me.You are so amazing Em!I live in Armenia and I know that I'll never meet you (I'm sure). But remember I will always love you even when no one will remember about you
